Break Inside

# Break Inside

## Usage

Please refer to the documentation on the Tailwind CSS website

## Compatibility

| Class                             | Support     |
| --------------------------------- | ----------- |
| ```
break-inside-auto
```         | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
break-inside-avoid
```        | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
break-inside-avoid-page
```   | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
break-inside-avoid-column
``` | 🌐 Web only |
